name: Death's Hand
description:
Death's Hand is a casual memory game. Play as the grim reaper collecting the souls of bad humans.

Once per level,  use your special vision to find evil purple spirits. Then, drag the corresponding humans into your death circle and harvest their lives.

Art: Kiyunn

Programming: Felix Soum

Music: http://www.trackmanbeatz.com/

SFX: http://soundbible.com/
